example.eg: It's such a long time since we've seen you.
example.egtrans: 自从上次见到你已过去那么久了。

example.eg: I have never seen such an amazing cake!
example.egtrans: 我从没见过那样的蛋糕！

example.eg: I find such people very annoying.
example.egtrans: 我发现这类人都很讨人厌。

example.eg: Take money from your purse? I never did any such thing!
The family in Sweden is extremely important and, as such, children's rights are very well protected.
example.egtrans: 家庭在瑞典极为重要，因此儿童的权利得到很好的保护。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 以这种身份，以这种资格, 本身，就其本身而言

example.eg: The restaurant doesn't have a gluten-free menu as such, but they have salads and other dishes without wheat.
example.egtrans: 确切地说，这家餐厅没有不含麸质的料理，不过他们有沙拉和其他材料中不含小麦的菜品。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 确切地说, 准确地说

example.eg: He does that such a lot--I wish he'd stop.
There are such a lot of applicants this year, it will be hard to get in.
We walked all over such-and-such street.
She has lots of good qualities, such as intelligence and wit.
example.egtrans: 她有许多好的品质，诸如聪颖、智慧。

example.eg: All the boys want to meet a girl such as her.
example.egtrans: 所有的男孩都想认识她那样的女孩。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 那样的, 有那样特点的

example.eg: It was a helmet, such as football players wear.
example.egtrans: 那是一顶诸如橄榄球运动员会戴的那类头盔。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 诸如此类的, 天下没有免费的午餐

example.eg: It was a mystery why he should go to such an extent.
He yelled to such an extent that my ears almost burst.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 到如此大的程度, 竟然到了这样的程度
